projects.title: STEALTH GTR REBUILD
projects.description: Full aerodynamic carbon conversion and Stage 3 ECU remapping for track-ready performance.

testimonial.content: The attention to detail in the carbon fiber work is unlike anything I've seen in Kerala. Pure mechanical art.
testimonial.name: Arjun Das

projects.title: NEO-CLASSIC RESTORATION
projects.description: A nut-and-bolt restoration of a classic silhouette, integrated with modern suspension and LED optics.

testimonial.content: They didn't just fix the car; they preserved its soul while making it drive like a 2026 model. Incredible.
testimonial.name: Rahul Menon

projects.title: OBSIDIAN CABIN CUSTOMS
projects.description: Complete interior overhaul featuring hand-stitched Alcantara, forged carbon inserts, and ambient fiber optics.

testimonial.content: The interior feels more luxurious than a private jet. The craftsmanship is world-class.
testimonial.name: Sarah Zakaria

projects.title: DEFENDER MATRIX FACELIFT
projects.description: Legacy-to-Modern conversion. Matrix LED system integration and aggressive wide-body paneling.

testimonial.content: The conversion is seamless. People honestly think I bought the newest model from the showroom.
testimonial.name: Irfan Khan
